jobDescription: The Data Scientist role will lead individual and team based projects  which test, optimize and recommend the ideal algorithm for clients to  create the next generation of intelligence to improve health and care.  The Data Scientist will need strong working knowledge of data mining  algorithms including decision trees, probability networks, association  rules, clustering, and neural networks. Various programming languages,  statistical software, visualization tools, and platforms will be used.  This requires the ability to learn independently and apply new skills  quickly. The Data Scientist will also need experience in rapidly  prototyping, measuring, and iterating, as well as excellent  interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills. He/she will  be expected to present their findings and recommendations to internal  and external stakeholders.
